Table of Contents

Class: RuleBuilder daxfi/RuleBuilder.py

Class used to build a set of Rule objects.

The parseXMLString() method return a list of Rule objects for the given XML string.

  getRulesWithLog  
getRulesWithLog (
        self,
        rd,
        action,
        rn,
        )

Return the rules for this XML.

Elaborate the current XML and return a set of Rule object. For firewalls that can log and set rules with a single command.

  getRulesWithoutLog  
getRulesWithoutLog (
        self,
        rd,
        action,
        rn,
        )

Return the rules for firewalls without a log option (they need a separated logging rule, like iptables).
